articles.author: Veronika Melkozerova
articles.title: Russia's ghost loomed over Ukraine peace summit - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: More than 80 out of 101 participants supported the final statement backing Ukraine’s territorial integrity, but some key countries balked.
articles.content: This summit is a tremendous success," U.S. National Security Adviser Jake Sullivan declared in a speech on Sunday. "Youve managed to gather the whole world. Sullivan and U.S. Vice President Kamala Ha… [+1749 chars]
